name: Quantum Hoops
description:
Quantum Hoops is a lightweight action puzzle game, loosely based on basketball, where you play all sides to chain shots and score hoops. Link your shots together to progress and ultimately complete each level in this fast-paced game.

Play to finish, or go back in for a speedrun. Check the game's comments for a near 0-death time, but not abusing any mechanics, and see if you can beat it. There are currently 12 levels - race through them to see how low you can push it. There are many intentional exploits hidden in the game (as well as likely some unintentional ones).

For a first-time player, this game should take roughly 8-10 minutes to complete.

Have fun!

The game is Windows-only... sorry :(
